name: monorepo
description: Monorepo for web app, Astro marketing site, and Starlight docs

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm -w packages/design-system run dev" "npm -w apps/web run dev" "npm -w apps/marketing run dev" "npm -w apps/docs run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently "npm -w apps/web run start" "npm -w apps/marketing run start" "npm -w apps/docs run start"
